reviewText: I bought this as a christmas present. My son liked it. I did not watch it so I can not give an opinion,

I absolutely loved this anime! I was a bit aprhensive  to buying this product with the lack of reviews but I'm glad I took a chance. When you first open the case there are only 2 discs. Do not let that scare you! All 26 episodes and both OVAs are there. The only thing I didn't like was that the OVAS are only in Japanese but not a huge deal.
One of the discs won't play.
Met my expectations in drama, romance.
